snippet.title: Ravage Road: The Tower Defense Deckbuilding Roguelike Indie Game
snippet.description:
Ravage Road is a pixel art indie game with tower defense, deckbuilding, and roguelike elements. Design the perfect defensive path to keep the forces of good at bay, construct towers using cards from your deck of allies, and unlock spells to lob at your foes as they march towards your central tower. 

Coming to Steam December 2022!
